Description: Enable or disable automatic lane changes for the vehicle.
Enable or disable collision detection between two specific actors.
Minimum distance in meters to the vehicle in front (front-to-back).
Global lateral offset from center of lane for all vehicles.
Difference (%) between target and limit speed. Negative exceeds speed limit.
Percentage chance of ignoring traffic lights.
Percentage chance of ignoring stop signs.
Percentage chance of ignoring collisions with other vehicles.
Percentage chance of ignoring collisions with pedestrians.
Chance of vehicle staying in slow lane (rightmost or leftmost depending on traffic side).
Probability per timestep that the vehicle will attempt a left lane change.
Probability per timestep that the vehicle will attempt a right lane change.
Enable/disable automatic light updates by the Traffic Manager.
Vehicle-specific lateral offset from lane center.
Difference (%) between vehicle target and current speed limit. Negative allows speeding.
